project.definition: A type of official organization which aims to encourage and develop art, literature, science, etc.
A thing that somebody has done successfully, especially using their own effort and skill.
project.hint: The act or process of achieving something.

project.definition: A road vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing the pedals with your feet.
A man who has never been married.
A new or difficult task that tests somebody's ability and skill.
project.hint: An invitation or a suggestion to sb that they should enter a competition, fight, etc.

project.definition: An illegal act or activity that can be punished by law.
The art or process of deciding how sth will look, work, etc. by drawing plans, making models, etc.
Something that you feel you have to do because it is your moral or legal responsibility.
A building where people stay, usually for a short time, paying for their rooms and meals.
